_header: The lion stands on the hill
_description: The Bestiary, or Physiologus — 602 short lines of unrhymed alliterative verse

BLAru292.First Lines: De leun stant on hille& he man hunten here…
BLAru292.Last Lines:
…In hole of ston ge maked hir nestIn cristes milce irre hope
                    is best
